title: JBoss jBPM Process (jPDL 4)
description: A subset of BPMN 1.2 for execution with jPDL 4

stencils.title: BPMN-Diagram

properties.title: Name
properties.description: Name is an attribute that is text description of the Diagram.

properties.title: Documentation
properties.description: The modeler may add optional text documentation about the Diagram.
properties.description_de: Der Modellierer kann weiteren Text zur Dokumentation des Diagramms einfügen.

properties.title: Version
properties.description: This defines the Version number of the Diagram.

properties.title: ExpressionLanguage
properties.description: A Language may be provided so that the syntax of expressions used in the Diagram can be understood.
properties.description_de: Sprache, mit welcher im Diagramm verwendete Ausdrücke beschrieben sind.

properties.title: QueryLanguage
properties.description: A Language may be provided so that the syntax of queries used in the Diagram can be understood.
properties.description_de: Sprache, mit welcher im Diagramm verwendete Abfragen beschrieben sind.

properties.title: CreationDate
properties.description: This defines the date on which the Diagram was created.
properties.description_de: Datum an dem das Diagramm erstellt wurde.

properties.title: ModificationDate
properties.description: This defines the date on which the Diagram was last modified.

properties.title: Key
properties.description: Identification to distinct different process definitions. Multiple versions of a process with the same key can be deployed. The key:name combination must remain exactly the same for all deployed versions.

stencils.view: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8" standalone="no"?> <svg    xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg"    xmlns:svg="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg"    xmlns:oryx="http://www.b3mn.org/oryx"    xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink"    width="800"    height="600"    version="1.0">   <defs></defs>   <g pointer-events="fill" >     <polygon stroke="black" fill="black" stroke-width="1" points="0,0 0,590 9,599 799,599 799,9 790,0" stroke-linecap="butt" stroke-linejoin="miter" stroke-miterlimit="10" />     <rect id="diagramcanvas" oryx:resize="vertical horizontal" x="0" y="0" width="790" height="590" stroke="black" stroke-width="2" fill="white" />      <text font-size="22" id="diagramtext" x="400" y="25" oryx:align="top center" stroke="black"></text>   </g> </svg>

stencils.title: Task
stencils.description: A task is a unit of work - the job to be performed.

properties.title: ActivityType
properties.description: Typ der Aktivität

properties.title: CompletionQuantity
properties.description: Defines the number of tokens that must be generated from the activity
properties.description_de: Legt die Anzahl der Token fest, die von der Aktivität generiert werden müssen.

properties.title: Assignee
properties.description: id of the person to which this task must be assigned

properties.title: Candidate Groups
properties.description: resolves to a comma separated list of groupIds. All the people in the groups will be candidates for this task.

properties.title: Candidate Users
properties.description: resolves to a comma separated list of userIds. All the users will be candidates for this task.

stencils.view: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8" standalone="no"?> <svg    xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg"    xmlns:svg="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg"    xmlns:oryx="http://www.b3mn.org/oryx"    xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink"     width="102"    height="82"    version="1.0">   <defs></defs>   <oryx:magnets>    <oryx:magnet oryx:cx="1" oryx:cy="40" oryx:anchors="left" />    <oryx:magnet oryx:cx="50" oryx:cy="79" oryx:anchors="bottom" />    <oryx:magnet oryx:cx="99" oryx:cy="40" oryx:anchors="right" />    <oryx:magnet oryx:cx="50" oryx:cy="1" oryx:anchors="top" />    <oryx:magnet oryx:cx="50" oryx:cy="40" oryx:default="yes" />   </oryx:magnets>   <g pointer-events="fill" oryx:minimumSize="50 40" oryx:maximumSize="200 160" >     <rect id="taskrect" oryx:resize="vertical horizontal" x="0" y="0" width="100" height="80" rx="10" ry="10" stroke="black" stroke-width="1" fill="white" />      <text     font-size="14"     id="acttext"     x="50"     y="40"     oryx:align="middle center"    oryx:fittoelem="taskrect"    stroke="black">   </text>       <g id="none"></g>  <g        id="loop">       <path          oryx:anchors="bottom"          style="opacity:1;fill:none;fill-opacity:1;stroke:#000000;stroke-width:1.5;stroke-linecap:round;stroke-linejoin:round;stroke-miterlimit:2.0999999;stroke-dasharray:none;stroke-opacity:1"          id="path2396"          d="M 47.608384,75.188343 L 47.608384,78.188343 L 44.608384,78.188343 M 47.608384,78.188343 A 4.875,4.875 0 1 1 51.639336,78.189378"          />     </g>  <g id="multiple">   <path oryx:anchors="bottom" fill="none" stroke="black" d="M46 70 v8 M50 70 v8 M54 70 v8" stroke-width="2" />  </g>  <g id="compensation">   <path oryx:anchors="bottom" fill="none" stroke="black" d="M 62 74 L 66 70 L 66 78 L 62 74 L 62 70 L 58 74 L 62 78 L 62 74" stroke-width="1" />  </g>   </g> </svg>
stencils.description_de: Eine Task ist eine Arbeitseinheit. Sie repräsentiert die Aufgabe, die zu tun ist.

stencils.title: Data-based Exclusive (XOR) Gateway
stencils.description: When splitting, it routes the sequence flow to exactly one of the outgoing branches based on conditions. When merging, it awaits one incoming branch to complete before triggering the outgoing flow.

properties.title: Expression
properties.description: Script that will be evaluated in the specified expression language.

properties.title: Language
properties.description: The language in which expression is to be evaluated.

properties.title: Exclusive Handler
properties.description: Fully qualified classname of the handler implementation class.

stencils.view: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8" standalone="no"?> <svg    xmlns:oryx="http://www.b3mn.org/oryx"    xmlns:svg="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg"    xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg"    version="1.0"    width="40"    height="40">   <defs      id="defs4" />   <oryx:magnets>     <oryx:magnet        oryx:default="yes"        oryx:cy="16"        oryx:cx="16" />   </oryx:magnets>        <g>     <path        d="M -4.5,16 L 16,-4.5 L 35.5,16 L 16,35.5z"        id="frame"        fill="#ffffff"        style="stroke:#000000;stroke-width:1" />     <g        id="cross">       <path          d="M 8.75,7.55 L 12.75,7.55 L 23.15,24.45 L 19.25,24.45 z"          style="fill:#000000;stroke:#000000;stroke-width:1" />       <path          d="M 8.75,24.45 L 19.25,7.55 L 23.15,7.55 L 12.75,24.45 z"          style="fill:#000000;stroke:#000000;stroke-width:1" />     </g>       <text id="text_name" x="26" y="26" oryx:align="left top"/>      </g> </svg>
stencils.description_de: Bei einer Verzweigung wird der Sequenzfluss abhängig von Verzweigungsbedingungen zu genau einer ausgehenden Kante geleitet. Bei einer Zusammenführung wird auf eine der eingehenden Kante gewartet, um den ausgehenden Sequenzfluss zu aktivieren.

stencils.title: Parallel Gateway
stencils.description: When used to split the sequence flow, all outgoing branches are activated simultaneously. When merging parallel branches it waits for all incoming branches to complete before triggering the outgoing flow.
stencils.view: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8" standalone="no"?> <svg    xmlns:oryx="http://www.b3mn.org/oryx"    xmlns:svg="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg"    xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg"    version="1.0"    width="40"    height="40">       <oryx:magnets>     <oryx:magnet        oryx:default="yes"        oryx:cy="16"        oryx:cx="16" />   </oryx:magnets>   <g>     <path        d="M -4.5,16 L 16,-4.5 L 35.5,16 L 16,35.5z"        id="frame"        fill="#ffffff"        style="stroke:#000000;stroke-width:1" />     <path        d="M 6.75,16 L 25.75,16 M 16,6.75 L 16,25.75"        id="path9"        style="fill:#ffffff;stroke:#000000;stroke-width:3" />          <text id="text_name" x="26" y="26" oryx:align="left top"/>     </g> </svg>
stencils.description_de: Wenn der Sequenzfluss verzweigt wird, werden alle ausgehenden Kanten simultan aktiviert. Bei der Zusammenführung wird auf alle eingehenden Kanten gewartet, bevor der ausgehende Sequenzfluss aktiviert wird.

stencils.title: Start Event
stencils.view: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8" standalone="no"?> <svg    xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg"    xmlns:oryx="http://www.b3mn.org/oryx"    width="40"    height="40"    version="1.0">   <defs></defs>   <oryx:magnets>    <oryx:magnet oryx:cx="16" oryx:cy="16" oryx:default="yes" />   </oryx:magnets>   <g pointer-events="fill">     <circle id="frame" cx="16" cy="16" r="15" stroke="black" fill="white" stroke-width="1"/>  <text font-size="11"    id="text_name"    x="16" y="33"    oryx:align="top center"    stroke="black"  ></text>   </g> </svg>

stencils.title: End Event
stencils.description: The untyped end event typically marks the standard end of a process.

properties.title: Ends
properties.description: Specifies if the whole process instance should be ended or just the path of execution that arrives in the end activity.

properties.title: State
properties.description: The state assigned to the execution.

stencils.view: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8" standalone="no"?> <svg    xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg"    xmlns:oryx="http://www.b3mn.org/oryx"    width="40"    height="40"    version="1.0">   <defs></defs>   <oryx:magnets>    <oryx:magnet oryx:cx="16" oryx:cy="16" oryx:default="yes" />   </oryx:magnets>   <g pointer-events="fill">     <circle id="frame" cx="16" cy="16" r="14" stroke="black" fill="white" stroke-width="3"/>  <text font-size="11"    id="text_name"    x="16" y="32"    oryx:align="top center"    stroke="black"  ></text>   </g> </svg>
stencils.description_de: Untypisiertes End-Ereignis, welches ein normales Ende eines Prozesses markiert.

stencils.title: Error End Event
stencils.description: The process ends in an error state. As result a named error is thrown.

properties.title: Ends
properties.description: Specifies if the whole process instance should be ended or just the path of execution that arrives in the end activity.

properties.title: State
properties.description: The state assigned to the execution.

stencils.view: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8" standalone="no"?> <svg    xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg"    xmlns:oryx="http://www.b3mn.org/oryx"    width="40"    height="40"    version="1.0">   <defs></defs>   <oryx:magnets>    <oryx:magnet oryx:cx="16" oryx:cy="16" oryx:default="yes" />   </oryx:magnets>   <oryx:docker oryx:cx="16" oryx:cy="16" />   <g pointer-events="fill">     <circle id="frame" cx="16" cy="16" r="14" stroke="black" fill="white" stroke-width="3"/>          <path          style="fill:black;stroke:#000000;stroke-width:1.5;stroke-linecap:butt;stroke-linejoin:miter;stroke-miterlimit:10"          d="M 22.820839,11.171502 L 19.36734,24.58992 L 13.54138,14.281819 L 9.3386512,20.071607 L 13.048949,6.8323057 L 18.996148,16.132659 L 22.820839,11.171502 z"          id="errorPolygon" />  <text font-size="11"    id="text_name"    x="16" y="32"    oryx:align="top center"    stroke="black"  ></text>   </g> </svg>
stencils.description_de: Der Prozess endet in einem Fehlerzustand. Es wird abschließend ein benannter Fehler geworfen.

stencils.title: Cancel End Event

properties.title: Ends
properties.description: Specifies if the whole process instance should be ended or just the path of execution that arrives in the end activity.

properties.title: State
properties.description: The state assigned to the execution.

stencils.view: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8" standalone="no"?> <svg    xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg"    xmlns:oryx="http://www.b3mn.org/oryx"    width="40"    height="40"    version="1.0">   <defs></defs>   <oryx:magnets>    <oryx:magnet oryx:cx="16" oryx:cy="16" oryx:default="yes" />   </oryx:magnets>   <g pointer-events="fill">     <circle id="frame" cx="16" cy="16" r="14" stroke="black" fill="white" stroke-width="3"/>          <path d="M 9 9 L 23 23 M 9 23 L 23 9" fill="none" stroke="black" stroke-width="5" />  <text font-size="11"    id="text_name"    x="16" y="32"    oryx:align="top center"    stroke="black"  ></text>   </g> </svg>

stencils.title: Sequence Flow
stencils.description: Sequence Flow defines the execution order of activities.

properties.title: ConditionType
properties.description: Determine the typ of the flow object.
properties.description_de: Legt den Typ des Flussobjekts fest.

properties.title: ShowDiamontMarker
properties.description: System intern variable to set the Diamond invisible, if sourceShape is a gateway and ConditionType is set to Expression

stencils.view: <svg  xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg"  xmlns:oryx="http://www.b3mn.org/oryx"  version="1.0"  oryx:edge="edge" >  <defs>     <marker id="start" refX="1" refY="5" markerUnits="userSpaceOnUse" markerWidth="17" markerHeight="11" orient="auto">      <path id="conditional" d="M 0 5 L 8 0 L 16 5 L 8 10 L 0 5" fill="white" stroke="black" stroke-width="1" />    <path id="default" d="M 5 0 L 11 10" fill="white" stroke="black" stroke-width="1" />     </marker>     <marker id="end" refX="15" refY="6" markerUnits="userSpaceOnUse" markerWidth="15" markerHeight="12" orient="auto">      <path d="M 0 1 L 15 6 L 0 11z" fill="black" stroke="black" stroke-linejoin="round" stroke-width="2" />     </marker>  </defs>  <g id="edge">   <path d="M10 50 L210 50" stroke="black" fill="none" stroke-width="2" stroke-linecap="round" stroke-linejoin="round" marker-start="url(#start)" marker-end="url(#end)" />   <text id="condition" x="0" y="0" oryx:edgePosition="startTop"/>  </g> </svg>
stencils.description_de: Ein Sequenzfluss definiert die Reihenfolge der Ausführung von Aktivitäten.

stencils.title: Java Task
stencils.description: A process execution will execute the method of the class that is configured in this activity.

properties.title: Class
properties.description: The fully qualified classname

properties.title: Method
properties.description: The name of the method to invoke

properties.title: Variable
properties.description: The name of the variable in which the return value should be stored.

properties.title: Field
properties.description: describes a configuration value to inject in a memberfield before the method is invoked.

properties.title: Aguments
properties.description: method parameters

stencils.view: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8" standalone="no"?> <svg    xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg"    xmlns:svg="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg"    xmlns:oryx="http://www.b3mn.org/oryx"    xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink"     width="102"    height="82"    version="1.0">   <defs></defs>   <oryx:magnets>    <oryx:magnet oryx:cx="0" oryx:cy="40" oryx:anchors="left" />    <oryx:magnet oryx:cx="50" oryx:cy="80" oryx:anchors="bottom" />    <oryx:magnet oryx:cx="100" oryx:cy="40" oryx:anchors="right" />    <oryx:magnet oryx:cx="50" oryx:cy="0" oryx:anchors="top" />    <oryx:magnet oryx:cx="50" oryx:cy="40" oryx:default="yes" />   </oryx:magnets>   <g pointer-events="fill" oryx:minimumSize="50 40" oryx:maximumSize="200 160" >     <rect id="taskrect" oryx:resize="vertical horizontal" x="0" y="0" width="100" height="80" rx="10" ry="10" stroke="black" stroke-width="1" fill="white" />  <text     font-size="14"     id="acttext"     x="50"     y="40"     oryx:align="middle center"    oryx:fittoelem="taskrect"    stroke="black">  </text>   </g> </svg>
stencils.description_de: Die Ausführungsengine führt die Methode der Klasse aus, die in dieser Aktivität definiert wird.

stencils.title: Script
stencils.description: A script activity evaluates a script. Scripts can be specified in any language for which there is a JSR-223 compliant scripting engine.

properties.title: Expression
properties.description: the expression text to evaluate

properties.title: Text
properties.description: the expression text to evaluate

properties.title: Language
properties.description: the language in which the expression is specified

properties.title: Variable
properties.description: The name of the variable in which the return value should be stored.

stencils.view: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8" standalone="no"?> <svg    xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg"    xmlns:svg="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg"    xmlns:oryx="http://www.b3mn.org/oryx"    xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink"     width="102"    height="82"    version="1.0">   <defs></defs>   <oryx:magnets>    <oryx:magnet oryx:cx="0" oryx:cy="40" oryx:anchors="left" />    <oryx:magnet oryx:cx="50" oryx:cy="80" oryx:anchors="bottom" />    <oryx:magnet oryx:cx="100" oryx:cy="40" oryx:anchors="right" />    <oryx:magnet oryx:cx="50" oryx:cy="0" oryx:anchors="top" />    <oryx:magnet oryx:cx="50" oryx:cy="40" oryx:default="yes" />   </oryx:magnets>   <g pointer-events="fill" oryx:minimumSize="50 40" oryx:maximumSize="200 160" >     <rect id="taskrect" oryx:resize="vertical horizontal" x="0" y="0" width="100" height="80" rx="10" ry="10" stroke="black" stroke-width="1" fill="white" />  <text     font-size="14"     id="acttext"     x="50"     y="40"     oryx:align="middle center"    oryx:fittoelem="taskrect"    stroke="black">  </text>   </g> </svg>
stencils.description_de: Eine Skript-Aktivität evaluiert ein Skript. Es kann in jeder Sprache spezifiziert werden, für die eine JSR-223 kompatible Skript Engine existiert

stencils.title: HQL
stencils.description: With the hql activity, a HQL query can be performed on the database and the result is stored in a process variable

properties.title: Variable
properties.description: The name of the variable in which the result is stored

properties.title: unique
properties.description: A value of true means that the result from the hibernate query should be obtained with method uniqueResult(). The default is false and in that case the list()  method will be used to get the result.

properties.title: Query
properties.description: The HQL query

properties.title: Parameters
properties.description: The query parameters

stencils.view: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8" standalone="no"?> <svg    xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg"    xmlns:svg="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg"    xmlns:oryx="http://www.b3mn.org/oryx"    xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink"     width="102"    height="82"    version="1.0">   <defs></defs>   <oryx:magnets>    <oryx:magnet oryx:cx="0" oryx:cy="40" oryx:anchors="left" />    <oryx:magnet oryx:cx="50" oryx:cy="80" oryx:anchors="bottom" />    <oryx:magnet oryx:cx="100" oryx:cy="40" oryx:anchors="right" />    <oryx:magnet oryx:cx="50" oryx:cy="0" oryx:anchors="top" />    <oryx:magnet oryx:cx="50" oryx:cy="40" oryx:default="yes" />   </oryx:magnets>   <g pointer-events="fill" oryx:minimumSize="50 40" oryx:maximumSize="200 160" >     <rect id="taskrect" oryx:resize="vertical horizontal" x="0" y="0" width="100" height="80" rx="10" ry="10" stroke="black" stroke-width="1" fill="white" />  <text     font-size="14"     id="acttext"     x="50"     y="40"     oryx:align="middle center"    oryx:fittoelem="taskrect"    stroke="black">  </text>   </g> </svg>
stencils.description_de: Über eine HQL-Aktivität kann eine HQL-Anfrage an die Datenbank durchgeführt und das Ergebnis in einer Prozessvariablen gespeichert werden

stencils.title: SQL
stencils.description: With the sql activity, a SQL query can be performed on the database and the result is stored in a process variable

properties.title: Variable
properties.description: The name of the variable in which the result is stored

properties.title: Query
properties.description: The SQL query

properties.title: Parameters
properties.description: The query parameters

stencils.view: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8" standalone="no"?> <svg    xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg"    xmlns:svg="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg"    xmlns:oryx="http://www.b3mn.org/oryx"    xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink"     width="102"    height="82"    version="1.0">   <defs></defs>   <oryx:magnets>    <oryx:magnet oryx:cx="0" oryx:cy="40" oryx:anchors="left" />    <oryx:magnet oryx:cx="50" oryx:cy="80" oryx:anchors="bottom" />    <oryx:magnet oryx:cx="100" oryx:cy="40" oryx:anchors="right" />    <oryx:magnet oryx:cx="50" oryx:cy="0" oryx:anchors="top" />    <oryx:magnet oryx:cx="50" oryx:cy="40" oryx:default="yes" />   </oryx:magnets>   <g pointer-events="fill" oryx:minimumSize="50 40" oryx:maximumSize="200 160" >     <rect id="taskrect" oryx:resize="vertical horizontal" x="0" y="0" width="100" height="80" rx="10" ry="10" stroke="black" stroke-width="1" fill="white" />  <text     font-size="14"     id="acttext"     x="50"     y="40"     oryx:align="middle center"    oryx:fittoelem="taskrect"    stroke="black">  </text>   </g> </svg>
stencils.description_de: Über eine SQL-Aktivität kann eine SQL-Anfrage an die Datenbank durchgeführt und das Ergebnis in einer Prozessvariablen gespeichert werden

stencils.title: Wait
stencils.description: Process execution will wait until an external trigger is provided through the API.
stencils.view: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8" standalone="no"?> <svg    xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg"    xmlns:svg="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg"    xmlns:oryx="http://www.b3mn.org/oryx"    xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink"     width="102"    height="82"    version="1.0">   <defs></defs>   <oryx:magnets>    <oryx:magnet oryx:cx="0" oryx:cy="40" oryx:anchors="left" />    <oryx:magnet oryx:cx="50" oryx:cy="80" oryx:anchors="bottom" />    <oryx:magnet oryx:cx="100" oryx:cy="40" oryx:anchors="right" />    <oryx:magnet oryx:cx="50" oryx:cy="0" oryx:anchors="top" />    <oryx:magnet oryx:cx="50" oryx:cy="40" oryx:default="yes" />   </oryx:magnets>   <g pointer-events="fill" oryx:minimumSize="50 40" oryx:maximumSize="200 160" >     <rect id="taskrect" oryx:resize="vertical horizontal" x="0" y="0" width="100" height="80" rx="10" ry="10" stroke="black" stroke-width="1" fill="white" />  <text     font-size="14"     id="acttext"     x="50"     y="40"     oryx:align="middle center"    oryx:fittoelem="taskrect"    stroke="black">  </text>   </g> </svg>
stencils.description_de: Die Prozessausführung wird angehalten, bis eine Vortsetzung über die API getriggert wird.
